title: © Patented Riot Games® Upcoming Featured Game Mode™ List
body:
1. One for All Hexakill on Dominion
2. URF vs Doom Bots on Howling Abyss
3. No boots in the shop game mode
4. ARAM with all champions unlocked for everyone
5. Everyone moves 100% faster game mode
6. Everyone has 100% lifesteal and spellvamp mode
----
Has Riot's game mode creativity gone too far?
